Hello fatal.lexwow,

> My motive is to filter extracted links on basis of few rules, not all the rules defined in Scope.

It sounds like all you really need to do is modify your Scope to contain only these "few rules". Or is there a reason not to take that approach?

Noah


On 07/19/2010 10:29 PM, fatal.lexwow wrote:
>
> Hi,
>
> Is there a way to write my own post processor similiar to LinksScoper
> which applies rules defined in Scope(decideRules) one by one. My motive is to filter extracted links on basis of few rules, not all the rules defined in Scope.
> Thanks a lot. Please I need help in this regard.
>
